name: file_comment_deleted
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community A file comment was deleted  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					files:read 				 The file_comment_deleted event is sent when a file comment is deleted. It is sent to all connected clients for users who can see the file. Clients can use this notification to update comments in real-time for open files. The file property is a file object. Unlike file_comment_added and file_comment_edited the comment property only contains the ID of the deleted comment, not the full comment object.
